reviews.review_text: This is an outstanding phone! I had the A14 and wanted to get the newest version since mine cracked from dropping it. The A15 is a bit smaller but a beautiful phone. It's very reliable and I would buy this phone over any other expensive phone! Such a great deal!

reviews.title: A Grandmothers Review
reviews.review_text: This was for a replacement for another phone. It was for my grandson. who seems to enjoy it. has had no problems with this phone. and since the first phone had the Walmart Insurance on it. the replacement for another phone was smooth and easy, He was sent a phone upgrade on the replacement phone, he seems to like the phone and remember he is a teenage boy. so that says something, Thank you

I really like the phone. I ordered online from Walmart and just found out when I contacted att to switch service from my old phone that walmart did not show the phone as sold on their end. So att could not switch my service to my new phone. now I have to go to a walmart store to have them fix the proplem.

reviews.title: Charger sold separately:(- less of a bargain
reviews.review_text: The phone itself is fine, but no where on the listing on the Walmart web site does it list that it needs a special type of charger, sold separately , not your standard USB charger. I had to go back to Walmart and buy a charger. The only mention of the separate charger is on the package contents on the box that you don't see when ordering online. A different charger? Who do they think they are? Apple?

I have used Moto g phones for yhe past 10 years but before that I had an old Samsung Galaxy 5? It was great. Im having problems with Motorola. Their budget phones under 100 bucks are getting worse every year. Unfortunately this Samsung has not exactly blew me away. Its slow. When I'm out of the house I use ATT service. Its always been a bit slow but...this phone is taking over 2 minutes to open an app. At home using the wifi it even drags.Trying to type this review the phone cut off twice. I can't believe that people like this piece of sh%23t. Its too bad because Samsung makes good budget phones. Or they used to.Now they make 5000 dollar televisions. Dont buy this phone if you enjoy communicating.It sucks.

reviews.title: wasn't scanned by warehouse
reviews.review_text: I really don't know about the phone itself. it wasn't scanned by warehouse so we cannot activate it with at%26t. I have called at%26t Walmart customer service and seems like they are giving me the run around I will not be ordering any more phones from Walmart. and I wouldn't recommend ordering a phone from them.

I paid cash for the phone which was advertised as unlocked, and when I took it to the store it was not unlocked. An unlocked cell phone is one you can use with any SIM card from any carrier in any country

reviews.title: Phone wasn't scan
reviews.review_text: I am a valued customer at Walmart shop online and in person. I decided to buy a phone online bought Samsung A15 device went to the store to set it up to work, it says see my carrier I need to pay for phone and scan phone, this is embarrassing to have Staff look at me like I stole this device. When Staff package the phone without scanning it as paid I want a full refund. See picture on this page.

What do I think? I think Walmart Customer Service is terrible. Why would you send me an item I can't use? I literally placed a delivery order and it turned into a mess. They shipped it to me and it wasn't scanned therefore I can't use it at all. I spoke to agents with no help at all. They kept telling me to go to the store, However that's the reason for DELIVERY in the first place. I can't get to the store. They never have anything on track . I'm a faithful longtime Walmart customer and Walmart has done nothing but fail me over and over. After this, I'm sure I'll be taking my business elsewhere!!

i purchased this online, and att could not activate it because they said it had not been purchased. it had not been properly scanned by whoever shipped it. so it was showing stolen. after making a trip to att and walmart my issue is still unresolved and my sim card doesnt work in either phone until it is fixed. do not reccomend ordering online!!!

reviews.title: good phone, warehouse not scanning correctly
reviews.review_text: The phone itself is good. The issue is purchasing the phone online. It is not scanned correctly at the warehouse. Therefore, when you attempt to activate it, it registers as a stolen phone! i returned to the store and purchased and then purchased one there and had no issues! I am writing this review on it!

reviews.title: Happy and Unhappy at the same time!
reviews.review_text: I didn't give the full five stars for the fact that when I purchased the item online I found out after I received it in the mail that they didn't clear the item out of their system when they sent it to me in the mail and I am in a time crunch. Plus, I live forty five minutes away from the nearest Walmart in order to contact them to clear this phone out of their system. I am little irritated and annoyed that this crucial step was not executed before my phone left the facility. Now, I am trying to figure out a way to get through the busy signal of the phone system before I leave on this journey to see if my phone can get cleared out of the Walmart system. To top matters off my printer is not working and I have no phone or internet service in order to send a simple email to myself to prove the purchase of the phone. I do feel aggravated about this although I know that we all make mistakes therefore I am giving four stars considering the phone is brand new and it was likely an honest mistake however it is very inconvenient mistake at this time. I have to do this today because time is not on my side at the moment. I will leave it at that!!!

The phone was not scanned at point of sale so att suspended my account because of it. So no i wouldn't recommend it or Walmart to anyone. I am very unhappy. This has cost me in excess of a hundred dollars in the phone and my lost account -35 on a scale of 1-10

reviews.title: Buggy, slow, full of bloatware
reviews.review_text: In the span of a few weeks, I've had to restart the phone multiple times because it will act like I'm pressing the screen when I'm not. There isn't even a screen protector on it, so absolutely nothing is touching it. Google Maps started scrolling to the left endlessly and then jittering. Spotify randomly restarted, started at the first song of the queue, and turned volume to max despite closing the app a few minutes before and muting my phone. Really inconvenient in the middle of a lecture. As soon as I took my finger off the volume button, it turned back up. I kept trying to bring up volume controls on the screen to mute it, and it disappeared as soon as I opened it. I had to hold the volume button down and shut down the phone. It's also full of apps that can't be uninstalled, namely a number of Samsung and Google apps. I don't need both Chrome and the Samsung Internet app, but I can't uninstall either of them. I'd rather use a different GPS app, but I can't uninstall Maps. My phone is nearly out of space, and I can't get rid of the apps wasting space. The phone is also incredibly slow. I've never had a phone lag so much on an app like Forest. I don't need this phone to do much; I'm not playing mobile games.

reviews.title: They do not activate the phone.
reviews.review_text: If I could give zero stars, I would the phone seems really great but like all the other reviews, they are not scanning the activation barcode just the sale barcode so the phone is not activated. SIM card works. Phone number is connected to it, but you can't use it because they don't activate the phone. I went into Walmart today to get it fixed. They acted like they didn't know what was wrong. Gave me the runaround gave me the customer service number for AT%26T saying it's AT%26T's fault when you call that number, it says that you need to go back and finish your transaction meaning they don't activate the phone and it's just a headache, especially since there's so many reviews saying the same thing you would think that they would be more aware so I'm gonna go back tomorrow with the box I don't wanna refund. I just want them to scan the activation code so that I can use the phone. zero stars, I would the phone seems really great but like all the other reviews, they are not scanning the activation barcode just the sale barcode so the phone is not activated. SIM card works. Phone number is connected to it, but you can't use it because they don't activate the phone. I went into Walmart today to get it fixed. They acted like they didn't know what was wrong. Gave me the runaround gave me the customer service number for AT%26T saying it's AT%26T's fault when you call that number, it says that you need to go back and finish your transaction meaning they don't activate the phone and it's just a headache, especially since there's so many reviews saying the same thing you would think that they would be more aware so I'm gonna go back tomorrow with the box I don't wanna refund, just scan the activation code. Phone seems nice, just do not order online.

reviews.title: Amazing phone for $50 that works with Gen Mobile!
reviews.review_text: This phone is so amazing for the price you pay!! I would recommend everyone who gets this phone to disable Google Discover, uninstall extra bloatware apps, disable widgets, disable background applications, etc, to make this phone a little faster. I am using Gen Mobile, which runs off the AT%26T network, and my sim card works fine in this phone. This phone looks, feels, and operates like a premium device, which is incredible for only $50. The battery isn't outstanding, but it is good enough to last all day. The screen is big and bright and beautiful. I was debating between this phone and the Moto G 2025, and I am so glad i went with this one! Best $50 I have spent in a long time!!

The phone is beautiful unfortunately getting the a t and t service should not take six hours, especially when you have a medical condition. It should not be this difficult to get on the network. Getting this gorgeous phone has been so difficult it had me in tears.

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.review_text: The screen is large enough that it can be used for work or entertainment. The battery life is good and the brightness level is pretty good. Overall recommend for entry level phone users. (Phone case sold separately)

reviews.title: Do not buy online
reviews.review_text: DO NOT ORDER THIS PHONE ONLINE. PEOPLE AT THE WAREHOUSE ARENT SCANNING RIGHT AND IT THAT WILL CAUSE YOUR ACCOUNT TO BE SUSPENDED AND U WILL HAVE TO GO IN STORE AND BUY A DIFFERENT PHONE THEN CALL AND HAVE THEN UNSUSPEND ACCOUNT AND GIVE SIM NUMBER

reviews.title: Stolen Phones
reviews.review_text: When I took these phones to have service put on them I was told they were stolen and locked. I was under the impression that they were purchased brand new from Walmart with NO previous owners! I know I sure paid for them!!
other than a little slow i like it way better than my iPhone XR it does everything and more than it did. i am very happy with it and for the price its fantastic..
it wouldve been better if you had been able to get the phone free with purchase of service onlime. because i haf to buy online due to not having a running car

I was not able to use this phone because it didn't work with the service plan I had because it is an AT%26T phone and my plan is not AT%26T. However it was a nice phone beautiful phone and I'm sure it works well thank you.
Big fan of Samsung Galaxy phones because they're affordable and come with all the bells and whistles, my only issue with this model is its not equipped with wireless charging.
I bought a phone online the phone was not activated I went to Walmart see if they got activated they activated my phone still is not working I will not recommend this
I just live this phone it was a very decent priced actually cheaper than what I expected. It has tons of storage and excellent quality and it charges fast and more fast.

Receive the phone call AT%26T to transfer my other AT%26T phone number to the new phone. They said it was not registered when it was sent out. There was no number for them to go by. They told me to get a hold of you also so you can straighten it out

I can't give a reasonable score here.. I thought this was the cord i needed, but it wasn't. I even read the description twice to make sure it was what i needed. Unfortunately, it turned out to be all wrong.
I just love the phone all around great camera, etc... the only thing that's a bummer is no screen recording however you can download a app to screen record. Overall I would give this phone 10 stars!!

reviews.title: Great, Inexpensive Phone
reviews.review_text: This is a great, inexpensive phone. It has good cameras, decent memory, and charges quick. User friendly with some cool features, I would purchase again.

reviews.title: Great phone!
reviews.review_text: I purchased this for my Mom who is 74 years old...she loves it! Very easy for her to navigate and use on a daily basis, and it has such great features! She thinks I paid a lot more for it than I actually did! Glad I went with this one for her!

reviews.title: It works
reviews.review_text: Instead of a $400 screen replacement this was an awesome alternative temporarily. Might buy another one to have on standby.
I didn't have any problems with the product except that it wasn't scanned properly whenever they sent it to me so I couldn't activate it

reviews.title: Don't buy

Its a decent phone for a low cost. Has some little techni al quirks about it that get on my nerves, but otherwise a good, cheap phone.
good phone just problem matching my old SIM card to the new phone and swapping services didn't come with a charger but other than that we good
